Designer Plus Plus

I'm a product designer and former product manager, working in Toronto, Canada.

I've toured the tech industry with a background in computer science, across a broad range of roles. Along the way, I’ve discovered my underlying passion is in the design and crafting of products that make peoples' lives better.

I’m an aspiring improvisor, who thinks work should be meaningful and fun. My friends would say I’m fascinated with chickens.

Product Manager

Experience leading Agile feature teams and building MVPs from idea to launch.

Developer

With a Computer Science degree from the University of Waterloo, I’ve built prototypes and know how to talk in code.

Check out my bits on GitHub

Comedian

Ask me about improv, chickens, and building a fun workplace culture.
